casebody.data:
ESTATE OF JOEY MICHAEL QUESENBERRY, Deceased Employee, Plaintiff
v.
BIG CREEK UNDERGROUND, Employer,
iSurity Insurance Services, Carrier, Defendants. No. 405P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. Barbara E. Ruark, Winston-Salem, for Big Creek Underground, et al. Franklin Smith, Elkin, for Estate of Quesenberry.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 7th day of August 2006 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th day of November 2006."
